# Single File Docs

## Publishing

- [Single file deployment and executable](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/deploying/single-file/overview.md): Learn what single file application is and why you should consider using this application deployment model.
